description:
This course is not sponsored by or affiliated with Udemy, Inc.

Udemy Your K-12 ClassroomÂ will show K-12 Teachers how they can implement the Udemy platform into their classroom blended learning environment. In particular, this course will propose how Udemy can be utilized within the different Blended Learning Models as articulated by the Clayton Christensen Institute. Students of this course will also learn how Common Core and the Next Generation Science Standards could be taught with Udemy as the curriculum platform. In terms of creating your own Udemy course, Sections 3 and 4 consist of "How To" Lectures that explain how teachers can create their course in the Udemy platform. (Course Image Attribution: Marie-Lan Nguyen/Wikimedia Commons/CC-BY 2.5)
title: Udemy Your K-12 Classroom - Unofficial
